Class WaitingListDAO

java.lang.Object
DataBase.dao.WaitingListDAO
public class WaitingListDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for waiting list management.

Handles waiting-list lifecycle including creation, assignment, check-in, cancellation, and table reservation coordination. Used by dashboard, terminal, and background schedulers.

  • Method Details

    • insertWaiting

      public static void insertWaiting(int numOfCustomers, Timestamp requestTime, String status, String confirmationCode) throws Exception
      Inserts a new waiting-list entry.
      Parameters:
      numOfCustomers - number of customers in the party
      requestTime - time the request was made
      status - initial status (WAITING / ASSIGNED)
      confirmationCode - unique confirmation code
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • getAllWaitingList

      public static List<WaitingListDTO> getAllWaitingList()
      Retrieves all active waiting-list entries.

      Includes only WAITING and ASSIGNED statuses, ordered by request time for dashboard display.

      Returns:
      list of waiting-list DTOs

    • getByCode

      public static WaitingListDTO getByCode(String code) throws Exception
      Retrieves a waiting-list entry by confirmation code.
      Parameters:
      code - confirmation code
      Returns:
      WaitingListDTO or null if not found
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • updateStatusByCode

      public static boolean updateStatusByCode(String code, String newStatus) throws Exception
      Updates waiting-list status by confirmation code.
      Parameters:
      code - confirmation code
      newStatus - new status value
      Returns:
      true if updated, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • cancelAssignedOver15Minutes

      public static int cancelAssignedOver15Minutes() throws Exception
      Cancels ASSIGNED waiting-list entries older than 15 minutes.

      Also releases any tables reserved for expired assignments.

      Returns:
      number of canceled entries
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • insertWaitingReturnId

      public static int insertWaitingReturnId(int numOfCustomers, Timestamp requestTime, String status, String confirmationCode) throws Exception
      Inserts a waiting-list entry and returns its generated ID.
      Parameters:
      numOfCustomers - number of customers
      requestTime - request timestamp
      status - initial status
      confirmationCode - confirmation code
      Returns:
      generated waiting_id or -1 if failed
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • cancelWaitingOlderThanHours

      public static int cancelWaitingOlderThanHours(int hours) throws Exception
      Cancels waiting-list entries that exceeded a given age.
      Parameters:
      hours - threshold in hours
      Returns:
      number of canceled entries
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

      public static WaitingListDTO getByCode(Connection conn, String code) throws Exception
      Throws:
      Exception

    • updateStatusByCode

      public static boolean updateStatusByCode(Connection conn, String code, String newStatus) throws Exception
      Throws:
      Exception

    • checkInWaitingListByCode

      public static TerminalValidateResponseDTO checkInWaitingListByCode(String code) throws Exception
      Performs check-in for a waiting-list entry by confirmation code.

      Validates status, occupies reserved tables, creates visits, and updates waiting-list status to ARRIVED.

      Parameters:
      code - confirmation code
      Returns:
      terminal validation response DTO
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • assignNextWaitingByReservingTable

      public static WaitingListDTO assignNextWaitingByReservingTable() throws Exception
      Assigns the next suitable waiting-list entry by reserving tables.

      Uses seat availability, future reservation protection, and best-fit table allocation logic.

      Returns:
      assigned WaitingListDTO or null if none fit
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • cancelAndReleaseTablesByCode

      public static boolean cancelAndReleaseTablesByCode(String code) throws Exception
      Cancels a waiting-list entry by confirmation code.

      Releases any tables reserved for the entry.

      Parameters:
      code - confirmation code
      Returns:
      true if canceled, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • cancelWaitingById

      public static boolean cancelWaitingById(int waitingId) throws Exception
      Cancels a waiting-list entry by ID (staff action).

      Prevents cancellation if already ARRIVED or CANCELED, and releases any reserved tables.

      Parameters:
      waitingId - waiting-list ID
      Returns:
      true if canceled, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • getEmailForWaitingId

      public static String getEmailForWaitingId(int waitingId) throws Exception
      Retrieves contact email for a waiting-list entry.
      Parameters:
      waitingId - waiting-list ID
      Returns:
      email or null if not found
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • getPhoneForWaitingId

      public static String getPhoneForWaitingId(int waitingId) throws Exception
      Retrieves contact phone number for a waiting-list entry.
      Parameters:
      waitingId - waiting-list ID
      Returns:
      phone or null if not found
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error
